name: Rat Pizza Time
description:
15 Minutes! That is all you have to escape the burning oven before it's heat melts you down to a memory! Luckily for you, there's a pizza in with you! And before it becomes a delicious delight, it's got some tools you can use to escape! Use ingredients to traverse the Oven, cut wires, and escape!

CONTROLS:

W & D: Forward and Back

A & D: Rotate Left and Rotate Right

Space: Jump

E: Pick up Ingredient/Drop Ingredient/ Throw Ingredient

Q: Interact (when prompt available).
